text: Octagon is an unincorporated community in Wabash Township, Tippecanoe County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. The community is part of the Lafayette, Indiana Metropolitan Statistical Area. ==History== A post office was established at Octagon in 1866, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1900. ==Geography== Octagon is located at with an elevation of 755 feet. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Tippecanoe County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana Category:Lafayette metropolitan area, Indiana
title: Octagon, Indiana
